name: 邱德威
objective:
課程綱要：
1.半導體元件簡介
2.物理氣相沉積
3.化學氣相沉積
4.微影─光阻覆蓋，曝光，顯影
5.蝕刻─濕式蝕刻，乾式蝕刻
6.攙雜─擴散法，離子植入法
7.氧化和熱處理製程
schedule:
ch1 Introduction
ch2 Introduction to IC fabricaiton
ch3 Semiconductor Basic
ch4 Wafer Manufacuring
ch5 Thermal Process
ch6 Photolithography
ch7 Plasma Process
ch8 Ion implantation
ch9 Etch
ch10 CVD
ch11 Metalization
ch12 CMP
ch13 Semiconductor Devices
scorePolicy:
報告40%
期中考30%
期末考30%
materials: Introduction to Semiconductor Manufacuring Technology (Hong Xiao)
